text: A true craftsman’s, the shop is a clean as a surgical room. Mike does not work on cars, he fixes them.  Great honesty service, ole fashion values, with technical competence as his centerpiece.  What a great experience during a frustrating time.

resp.text: Thanks Vinny!! What a wonderful complement! Glad we were able to help you out!

name: nathan worth
text: Hands down best service I have experienced in a long time. These guys clearly pride themselves in everything they do. If you are looking for an honest job these are the guys. This is will be my first stop regardless of the project.

resp.text: Thanks Nathan!! Glad to help!

name: Clint Grantham
text: Friendly, honest, knowledgeable & professional.  Shop is clean and organized.  Reasonable prices. I have complete confidence in these guys.

resp.text: Thanks Clint for a great review!

name: Stephanie Hawkins
text:
Mike, Trent and the entire crew at Transmatic Transmission are incredible!! They are professional, knowledgeable and very friendly!! They fixed our Infiniti G37! They were able to do a clutch and master cylinder installment with fabrication to the transmission bell housing which improved clutch pedal and shifting response and eliminated his problem of premature friction plate wear! For the work we received the cost was incredible as well!! We highly recommend them!!

Thank you guys - John Perez & family!!

resp.text: Thanks John for taking the time to leave a review & recommendation! Let us know if we can help with anything else.

name: J Steph
text: You won't find another shop in 300 miles with this amount of good reviews. Mike is trustworthy and accountable, it will be repaired right or not at all. Mike rebuilt my 48re in a 2500 ram diesel with heavy clutches, billet servo piston, and a billet torque converter. He had to replace some hard parts and still only charged me what he quoted me. I will say this, it cost 1k less than any other 48re built the same that I could find . It has now been 6 months, pull a 10k lb camper regularly - not a single problem. I feel fortunate to have found this shop, could not be happier with the service and product that I recieved.

resp.text: Glad we could help Joel! Thanks for the recommendation!

name: Michael Lassiter
text: Some of the best people you will ever meet. Honest and trustworthy is an understatement. I have never seen a shop that will invite a customer in to show exactly what the problem is, explain what caused the problem and then gives options and recommendations even if his recommendation is a solution that is less work and less expensive.

resp.text: Thanks you Mike! Thanks for taking time to leave us a great review!

name: Jeffrey Roth
text: We love the service at Transmatic Transmissions.  Mike and Jamie are always very helpful when ever we need them.  We have never had any issues with any repairs and they will make you feel like family. They are the only shop I will ever use.

resp.text: Thanks Jeff for a great review! Let us know if we can help in any way.

name: Matt Seiber
text:
Transmatic did some warranty work for me last week,  and was very helpful and friendly. I'm sure that warranty work is a pain, but he never gave me any issues and got my vehicle back to me in a very timely manner.

If I'm ever back at Rucker (we always come back: )) and need work done, I'll come here first.

resp.text: Thanks!!

name: Isaac Helvin
text: Needed an air conditioning line welded up on my Chevy pickup. They did a great job! Very professional! Could not ask for better service!

resp.text: Thanks Isaac!

name: C. Herring
text:
Superb service and repair! Mike and Trent are truly professional when it comes to the care and maintenance of your vehicle. Their repair shop is organized and well maintained. Trent came and picked up my truck and delivered to their shop with care. They immediately started the repair and was amazed on how fast they completed the job. After they removed the transmission and before putting it back together, Mike took the time to show me each part, the part that failed, and what parts he was going to install. He also make recommendations on upgrades and suggestions on the care and maintenance on the vehicle after the repair was complete. While removing the transmission and re-installing it, Trent inspected the vehicle components to ensure that any or potential problems were identified along with repair recommendations.
There was no stress and at no time did I feel they were pushing for un-neccessary repairs. I can say that they truly "have your back" on repairing your transmission.
They are like doctors, they want to do a check-up on my truck in two weeks to ensure that everything is operating properly with no leaks. The one year warranty is awesome, but I believe that because of the correct and  proper repair, I won't have to bring it back in for any warranty work. Awesome job Mike and Trent, I know with your high maintenance standards and friendly customer service will take your business far!!! Thanks again!!!!!

resp.text: Wow!! Thank you for taking time to give us a great review & telling our future customers about your experience!

name: Jan Peters
text:
Clean shop, true car mechanics (no parts changer).
Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thanks for the recommendation!

name: wickdgt
text: (Mike) Transmatic Transmissions is the only shop that works on my vehicles transmission. Trust worthy, has done my race car transmission, the gears on my truck and my wifes van etc. All great prices, tells you and shows you what is wrong and what is needed to be done. He would not start a job unless he has confirmed with the owner. Very honest and will not guide you wrong.

resp.text: Thanks for the repeat business & for leaving us a great review! We value you as a customer. Give us a call with any future needs.

name: Jerry Sanders
text: I had my transmission on my Honda Odyssey rebuilt 2 years ago by these folks and have been well pleased. No issues at all. They were very helpful and courteous and treated me very well!

resp.text: Thank you Jerry for your business & for taking time to leave us a review!

name: Brandon Jackson
text:
Mike and his guys are absolutely awesome.  I took on a project transmission at my house and was ready to give up.  Mike did everything he could to save me money by keeping my transmission out of his shop.  He gave me so many tips and tricks, and pointers on how to properly build my transmission.  He even stopped by my house to check my work, FOR FREE!

I have spent many hours in the shop with Mike, just watching him work, and he is incredibly thorough.  He is a very honest and trustworthy individual and I would never hesitate to take my vehicles to him if need be.  If you have troubles with your transmission then don't even think about any other shop, GO TO MIKE!!

resp.text: Thanks, Charles! Glad I could help you out!! I enjoy project cars and enjoy teaching. Thanks for the review!!

name: Mendy Pickle
text: We have always had great service from Transmatic Transmissions. Mike is fair & honest w us. Being a female, I appreciate that!

resp.text: Thanks Mendy! Appreciate you taking time to leave a review!

name: Kenneth Gunter
text: I have dealt with many auto and transmission shops in the past and I have to say this is one of the better shops I have ever dealt with.  I have had them install gears as well as transmission work and have never had an issue.  They go out of their way to help their customers.  I would definitely recommend them to anyone.

resp.text: Kenneth, thank you for the review & your repeat business!

name: Jan Mccarson
text: Mike and his family are great people! I wouldn't hesitate to bring my vehicle there for work.

resp.text: Thanks Jan for a great review! We appreciate you!!

name: jennifer jackson
text: My husband's truck stopped in the road - literally.  He pushed it to the side, called Transmatic and they towed it soon after.  WIthin a day, we had a "diagnosis" and an estimate.  Mike showed us every part, how it worked and what was wrong.  He was very thorough.  I thought the price was very fair considering it was a 4 wheel drive truck (and I knew what I had paid to have my "regular transmission" Tahoe rebuilt a few years earlier).  We have had no complaints about the job that was done.

resp.text: Thank you Jennifer!

name: david willis
text: Woukd recommend Transmatic Transmission in Enterprise to everyone I know! They know customer service and how to treat their clients! Hard to find folks these days that truly care AND do a great job! Thanks Mike!

resp.text: Thanks Dave for leaving a great review!

name: Haley Harding
text: Had an appointment on a Thursday morning for a diagnostic test and when I called around 2pm they said my car was next. Called several times with no response. Finally on Tuesday, five days later, the had ran the diagnostic but informed me that I would need to take my car to another shop to fix it. Very displeased with their service. They kept my car five days and couldn't do a discount or anything. I have no problem paying that but five days just to run a diagnostic is absolutely ridiculous! Will never go back to transmatic transmission due to poor service and rude employees!!

resp.text: Haley, So sorry you felt displeased. Yes, you had an appointment with us Thursday morning to leave it with us so we could properly diagnose your vehicle. However, you brought it that afternoon instead. Yes, it took little longer to get to as it would not start. We are closed Sat & Sunday. When Mike could get it running & get it properly diagnosed it was a problem that needed to be repaired elsewhere. He charges a $75 flat rate diagnostic fee as you were told prior to leaving it. Sorry you feel that is unfair. It took him a lot longer than 1 hour to work on the car to get it running and to then diagnose the problem. Hope you were able to get your vehicle repaired.

name: Josh McGowan
text: Good hardworking honest people working here. I would use again

resp.text: Thanks, Josh! Glad we could help!

name: snooper J
text: These people are dishonest. I am female and took my vehicle there to check on some slipping I have been having on my transmission. I told them IF it needed the fluid change to change it BUT if it need more major work to let me know first. By 4 in the afternoon I didn't hear anything so I called and MIKE said he drove the vehicle and didn't find anything wrong and the fluid was good. So when I went to pick my vehicle up it was in the exact same spot I parked it at and the seat was not even moved. I am really short and MIKE is tall so HE did not check my car and they charged me 75 dollars for nothing and gave me a blank service receipt. I am really disappointed that Mike stooped so low .

resp.text:
Lupe,
It is with sincere apologies that you feel we were dishonest with you.  I spoke with you to let you know that I could not get the problem to show itself and that you could pick up your vehicle.  I am sorry that I was not there when you arrived to get your vehicle. I told you to bring it back by the shop when it was giving you the problem and I would be more than happy to drive it again without charge as sometimes the problem will not show itself.  I was trying to help you and not take advantage of you as had I charged you more and serviced a transmission that is already having problems it would not fix the problem and could possibly make it worse for you.  I did charge you a diagnostic fee for the time I took to test drive your car and to scan it for problems. I am sorry that you feel your car was not moved.  I can assure you that in fact it was moved. As in the email my wife sent you we do value our customers and would have liked an opportunity to have made this right or talked further with you.  We did speak to our employee for not making the ticket note that a diagnostic fee was what you paid $75 for. Sorry for the delay in response as we usually are not checking online reviews. This was brought to our attention by Google. Again, our deepest apologies.

Mike

name: Keith Kraker
text: Very busy shop and hard to get in. A testament to what people thing about the quality of this shop, however, plan at least a month in advance if you need any work done. Called/stopped in four weeks in a row and was told every time to call back a week later. Was never able to have them take a look at my car, much less fix it. Mike was very polite in person but a little brusque on the phone.

resp.text: Your business is appreciated. We will work to fix this and sorry for any inconvenience. Call me if there is anything I can do to help you out if you haven't been able to get your car in anywhere else. Most times the waiting is not a month. We have been blessed to be busy lately. We strive to do quality work and due to limited parking we do not like to take vehicles in until we are ready to work on them. Thank you for your review & again call if I can do anything.

He even went the extra mile to take me to a hotel, help carry my things inside, and make sure I was safe. This dude is seriously my hero, and he’s one of the kindest people I’ve ever met. resp.text: The Alabama Unconscionable Pricing Act applies only during a time of a declared disaster (Alabama Code Title 8. Commercial Law and Consumer Protection § 8-31-4). Our prices are are all fair, reasonable and competitive with other area businesses and some services prices are set by the jurisdiction for rotational tows (ie: State Rotation, Tuscaloosa PD, Northport PD, UAPD, TCSO)

text: I brought my 2010 BMW 530i in to have it serviced; might I add I’ve used them numerous times.  I’ve never had a problem with them before. Mind you the guy that helped me was very rude; I asked him what are my options and he said junk it because that’s what I have.  Fast forward twelve months later I  sold the car to a male friend; he had it towed back to Mike & Mike under his name and they replaced the battery and a few minor things for $700.  Ladies please don’t let this happen to you. This was absolutely unbelievable and I really enjoyed how quickly they use to fix my car and get it back to me.  I was truly taken advantage of and lost a good car.

name: Queen
text: Very welcoming. I loved the experience. I honestly haven’t taken care of my car in so long and just moved to the area. They took care of it like back home. Will be a regular from now on.

name: Tristen Blackwood
text: If I could give them a 0 I would I have taken my car to them 5 times I have spent $6000 roughly and still haven't got my car fixed plus it's making new noises. Clutch kit was installed wrong writhed on 4v time and still not right

name: Bethany
text: Steer clear if at all possible. Not a good experience. Paid $200 even though couldn’t fix or diagnose problem after a few weeks. We paid though so we could get our car and didn't argue. We go to pick it up and even though drove the car in, was not able to drive it out. Towed to dealership who then fixed it in a day for $140 and has been driving great ever since. The scary part was Mike and TJ were trying to get it back to their shop from dealership so they could have it in their possession once again and up charge us even though we had already paid them once. Fortunately we paid dealership who fixed it and got it back ourselves before they could. Dealership just shook their heads when they heard what was happening. We felt we shouldn’t have to pay Mike’s towing company since our car was no longer drivable after being in their possession and that also upset them.

name: Ron Ross
text: Repairs done fast and at a reasonable price.

name: Corey Eddins
text: Had a full tank of gas when I dropped my car off for repair. When I picked my car up after they were "Finished", my gas tank was almost on Empty. Plus they tried to charge me $600.00 just to put a Mercedes car battery in. I took my car to an actual Mercedes shop and they only charged me $200.00. I thought these people at Mike and mike's were good people, but nope🥀.

name: Angel
text: This is my first time at Mike & Mike's and I am so glad I found this place! The google maps directions took me to the wrong place but when I called, they were very friendly and helped to get me where I needed to be. Mike's prices are fair, the mechanic, TJ was very nice, and they are quick to offer less expensive options for repairs if a replacement is not necessary. Will definitely be coming back for future car care and maintenance!

name: Joseph Traffanstedt
text: They are a good auto shop. Quality work, reasonably fast, and friendly. Had 3 repairs done there so far. Each time work was done in 2 days and fixed properly. Seem to be really honest and good people.

name: Rod Johnson
text: Reached out to get quote regarding fixing my Ford 150 exhaust. I advised someone will contact me back but haven't heard anything since then. Thats been over 3 weeks

name: Shantrice Hadley
text: Great Customer Service and always willing to help!!

name: Busta Smith
text: I called a day before and explained i may have an exhaust leak and would like to make an appointment to fix it. They were nice and said they can look at it. Told me they're usually not swamped and just bring it in any time the next day. I show up the next day and they tell me immediately that they can't work on my car (without even looking at it or asking what car i have) because they don't work on exhausts. But their website claims they're experts and they specialize in German cars. Can't really specialize in something if you're not able to fix exhausts?  I don't know if seeing me in person, not the car, has anything to do with the service (or lack of) I was provided.

name: John Allen Dees
text: Honest, fair, polite, and quick turnaround.  Can’t ask more from an auto service center. Highly recommend.

name: Thomas Whitten
text: Awesome service. Priced right and quick.

name: Michael Sulprizio
text: I found Mike& Mikes by doing a Google map search, which will go down as one of my best finds via google maps EVER. M&Ms fixed an ongoing issue i had for months & was around $150 cheaper from other shops around the area.  Thanks for taking car of my car...

name: Valerie T Porter
text: The absolute best experience you will have with a mechanic. Mike and his staff are extremely knowledgeable, while being fair with his pricing. I am a New Yorker, but have known Mike for at least 10 years, and I would not let anyone else touch my 2006 Volkswagen Passat except Mike. For me and my car, Mike & Mike is the best mechanic in Birmingham. (no, I am not, a paid reviewer.

name: Foster David
text: These guys are nothing short of the best.

name: Dean Ethridge
text: Mike and Mike's is where I will always take my vehicles.  They do a great job and get us in and out of there typically in the same day.  Very knowledgeable staff that are factory certified to work on BMW, Mercedes, Volkswagen and Audi.  They work on domestic too but very satisfied with the work they've done for us.

name: S Underwood
text: I called very upset when my car wouldn’t go into gear and I was stranded an hour and a half away from home. The gentlemen was very kind over the phone and sent someone to help me. The mechanic that came to help was very nice and honest. He explained the problem, got me calmed down, and back on the road.

name: Dean Ethridge
text: Mike and Mike's is where I will always take my vehicles.  They do a great job and get us in and out of there typically in the same day.  Very knowledgeable staff that are factory certified to work on BMW, Mercedes, Volkswagen and Audi.  They work on domestic too but very satisfied with the work they've done for us.

name: Terry Long
text:
I had a drive shaft hanger go out on my Volkswagen Touareg, around 11:00am. I contacted Mike and Mike's they had me bring it in to them (did I mention that this was a Friday?) the diagnosed the problem, ordered new parts, negotiated with my extend warranty provider, made my brother and I feel confortable waiting in the shop and, had my repairs done before 5:00pm. I have since spoken with people that have used them for repairs and all I've heard is great things about them.

Thanks for the great work guys

name: Mo'Nique Martin
text: Everytime I needed service on my car, they would give me the best prices,  the best service. Quick and fast with your car. Tell you everything that's wrong with it and they know how to get the job done. Best autoshop in Alabama that I know of.

name: Elizabeth Rogers
text: Mike has been my trusted go-to mechanic for many years. He helped me initially with repairs for my Volkswagen Jetta and now is helping me with my Subaru Outback. Mike has even gone out of his way to check what is wrong and give me a quote before proceeding with the repairs. I regularly recommend Mike to friends and coworkers.

name: Steve Forsyth
text: Do not take your car anyplace except to Mike and Mikes.  Mike is a fantastic mechanic and a great guy.  Mikes is even better!!!!!!!

text: Mike is a great guy. Cares about his clients and does awesome work. Saved me half off what the dealership charged and his is Volkswagon certified!

resp.text: Thank you guys for trusting us to serve. We appreciate you and the review

name: Patty
text: Our driver went above and beyond! It was dinner time, dark out, and we were from out of town. Didn’t know where anything was. They directed us to a better part of town for the Honda dealer. Took us to our hotel so we could unload our car (just starting a 2 week vacation-car was packed full) and then he took my husband to dealership to drop off the car and brought him back to the hotel. I just cannot give this company enough praise! Thank you, so very much for your help at a stressful time!
